item.title: The Army Wants You to Make Its Soldiers Pocket-Sized Drones
item.description:
The Army Wants You to Make Its Soldiers Pocket-Sized Drones

Drones first glided into the public imagination in the early 2000s when the US Air Force and the CIA started using school bus-sized Predator and Reaper unmanned aerial vehicles for surveillance and airstrikes in the Middle East.

item.title: Dirty little secrets: Inside the 'Ashley Madison' of the ultra-rich and ultra-powerful
item.description:
Dirty little secrets: Inside the 'Ashley Madison' of the ultra-rich and ultra-powerful

A new trove bigger than Wikileaks exposes the hidden underworld of drug dealers, sex traffickers, and tax cheats. Fusion takes you inside.
